title: D.I.O - Novel Updates
tags: Game Elements   Genius Protagonist   Magic   Male Protagonist   Sword And Magic   Virtual Reality   Weak to Strong
author: Park geon   박건
description:
Yoon Yong-no, a 'mutated genius' born one in a quintillion (1,000,000,000,000,000,000). A 'statistical miracle' where possibility exists in impossibility.

But, it was only possible because... it was a world with no constraints. 

Gradually, gods and transcendents involved themselves with this physical world.

In this chaotic turmoil, players with their real identities unknown, started making use of the game system to build up an armed group...>
